Class ExceptionalStream<T>

java.lang.Object
net.dapete.exceptional.ExceptionalStream<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the stream elements
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, BaseStream<T, Stream<T>>, Stream<T>
public final class ExceptionalStream<T> extends Object implements Stream<T>
A Stream with additional functionality.

Using exceptional() and invalid input: '{@link /*missing*/}'#exceptional(Class)}, it is possible to switch to an instance of the stream-like class OnlyExceptionalStream which implements methods analogue to Stream.map(Function) , Stream.filter(Predicate) etc. to allow lambdas that throw exceptions (from the net.dapete.exceptional.function package).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface Stream

    Stream.Builder<T>
